config.script:
# Get the list of scheduled events
	scheduled = self.props.scheduledEvents
	
	# Get the ID of the event to delete
	event_id = event.eventId
	item_id = event.itemId
	
	# Run the Named Query to update and delete from the database
	params = {"eventId": event_id}
#	system.db.runNamedQuery("UpdateRequestStatus", params)  # Named Query: update Request set Status = 'Slot Not Available' where RID = :eventId
	system.db.runNamedQuery("DeleteSchedule", params)       # Named Query: delete from Schedules where eventId = :eventId
	
	# Remove the event from the component's props
	self.props.scheduledEvents = [e for e in scheduled if not (e['eventId'] == event_id and e['itemId'] == item_id)]

eventId = self.props.selectedEvent.eventId
	itemId = self.props.selectedEvent.itemId
	query = "SELECT startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId = ?"
	eventData = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [eventId])[0]
	originalStartDate = eventData['startDate']
	originalEndDate = eventData['endDate']
	qq = "SELECT (20 * 60) - (DATEPART(HOUR, ?) * 60 + DATEPART(MINUTE, ?)) AS DurationInMinutes"
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(qq, [eventData['endDate'], eventData['endDate']])
	remainingMinutes = result[0]['DurationInMinutes']
	breakStartHour = 20  # 8 PM
	breakEndHour = 8     # 8 AM next day
	if remainingMinutes >= 60:
		newStartDate = originalStartDate
		newEndDate = system.date.addMinutes(originalEndDate, 60)
		updateMain = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?"
		system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateMain, [newStartDate, newEndDate, eventId])
		updateRequest = "UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?"
		system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateRequest, [newStartDate, newEndDate, eventId])
		currentEnd = newEndDate
	else:
		updatedate = system.date.addDays(originalStartDate, 1)
		updatetime = system.date.setTime(updatedate, 7, 0, 0)
		l = "SELECT eventId AS next FROM Schedules WHERE itemId = ? AND startDate = ?"
		ll = system.db.runPrepQuery(l, [itemId,updatetime])
		if ll.getRowCount() > 0:
			lll = ll.getValueAt(0, "next")  # âœ… Safe access
		else:
			lll = None  # Or handle gracefully
#		lll = ll[0]
		if lll is None:
			proposedEndDate = system.date.addMinutes(originalEndDate, 60)
			breakStart = system.date.setTime(originalEndDate, breakStartHour, 0, 0)
			firstPartEnd = breakStart
			remainingDuration = system.date.minutesBetween(breakStart, proposedEndDate)
			system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?", [originalStartDate, firstPartEnd, eventId])
			system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?", [originalStartDate, firstPartEnd, eventId])
			nextDayStart = system.date.addDays(originalStartDate, 1)
			nextDayStartt = system.date.setTime(nextDayStart, breakEndHour-1, 0, 0)
			secondPartEnd = system.date.addMinutes(nextDayStartt, remainingDuration)
			queryTasksyyy = "SELECT RID, Department,Status,l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark FROM Request WHERE RID = ?"
			taskrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryTasksyyy, [eventId])
			tasksyyy = taskrow[0]
			insertQuery1 = "INSERT INTO Request (Department,SDateTime, EDateTime, Status, l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark,SubID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?)"
			system.db.runPrepUpdate(insertQuery1, [tasksyyy['Department'], nextDayStartt, secondPartEnd, tasksyyy['Status'],tasksyyy['l'],tasksyyy['RequestTime'],tasksyyy['ProjectDescription'],tasksyyy['ProjectOwner'],tasksyyy['Remark'],tasksyyy['RID']])
			maxx = "SELECT EDateTime FROM Request WHERE RID = (SELECT MAX(RID) FROM Request)"
			maxxrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(maxx)
			maxxans = maxxrow.getValueAt(0,"EDateTime")
			m = "SELECT DATEPART(MINUTE, ?) AS m"
			mm = system.db.runPrepQuery(m,[maxxans])
			mmm = mm[0]['m']
			namedQuery = "INSERT INTO Schedules SELECT E.ID AS itemId, R.RID AS eventId, R.SDateTime AS startDate, R.EDateTime AS endDate, R.ProjectDescription AS label, R.l AS leadTime FROM Department AS E join Request AS R ON E.Department=R.Department WHERE R.RID NOT IN (SELECT eventId FROM Schedules) AND not (R.Status = 'Slot Not Available')"
			system.db.runPrepUpdate(namedQuery)
			minn = "SELECT startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
			minnrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(minn)
			st = minnrow[0]['startDate']
			en = minnrow[0]['endDate']
			if mmm == 30:
				addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -30)
				addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -30)
			else:
				addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -60)
				addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -60)
			now = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
			system.db.runPrepUpdate(now,[addddstart,addddend])
			currentEnd = secondPartEnd
		else:
			z = "SELECT RID, SubID, Status FROM Request WHERE RID = ?"
			zz = system.db.runPrepQuery(z, [lll])
			zzz = zz[0]
			RID = zzz['RID']
			if zzz['SubID'] == 0:
				proposedEndDate = system.date.addMinutes(originalEndDate, 60)
				breakStart = system.date.setTime(originalEndDate, breakStartHour, 0, 0)
				firstPartEnd = breakStart
				remainingDuration = system.date.minutesBetween(breakStart, proposedEndDate)
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?", [originalStartDate, firstPartEnd, eventId])
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?", [originalStartDate, firstPartEnd, eventId])
				nextDayStart = system.date.addDays(originalStartDate, 1)
				nextDayStartt = system.date.setTime(nextDayStart, breakEndHour-1, 0, 0)
				secondPartEnd = system.date.addMinutes(nextDayStartt, remainingDuration)
				queryTasksyyy = "SELECT RID,Department,Status,l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark FROM Request WHERE RID = ?"
				taskrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryTasksyyy, [eventId])
				tasksyyy = taskrow[0]
				insertQuery1 = "INSERT INTO Request (Department,SDateTime, EDateTime, Status, l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark,SubID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?)"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(insertQuery1, [tasksyyy['Department'], nextDayStartt, secondPartEnd, tasksyyy['Status'],tasksyyy['l'],tasksyyy['RequestTime'],tasksyyy['ProjectDescription'],tasksyyy['ProjectOwner'],tasksyyy['Remark'],tasksyyy['RID']])
				maxx = "SELECT EDateTime FROM Request WHERE RID = (SELECT MAX(RID) FROM Request)"
				maxxrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(maxx)
				maxxans = maxxrow.getValueAt(0,"EDateTime")
				m = "SELECT DATEPART(MINUTE, ?) AS m"
				mm = system.db.runPrepQuery(m,[maxxans])
				mmm = mm[0]['m']
				namedQuery = "INSERT INTO Schedules SELECT E.ID AS itemId, R.RID AS eventId, R.SDateTime AS startDate, R.EDateTime AS endDate, R.ProjectDescription AS label, R.l AS leadTime FROM Department AS E join Request AS R ON E.Department=R.Department WHERE R.RID NOT IN (SELECT eventId FROM Schedules) AND not (R.Status = 'Slot Not Available')"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(namedQuery)
				minn = "SELECT startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
				minnrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(minn)
				st = minnrow[0]['startDate']
				en = minnrow[0]['endDate']
				if mmm == 30:
					addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -30)
					addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -30)
				else:
					addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -60)
					addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -60)
				now = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(now,[addddstart,addddend])
				currentEnd = secondPartEnd
			else:
				query = "SELECT startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId = ?"
				nextdata = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [RID])[0]
				NextStartDate = nextdata['startDate']
				NextEndDate = nextdata['endDate']
				NextProposedEndDate = system.date.addMinutes(NextEndDate, 60)
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?", [NextStartDate, NextEndDate, RID])
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?", [NextStartDate, NextEndDate, RID])
				currentEnd = NextEndDate
	queryTasks = """SELECT itemId, eventId, startDate, endDate, label
	FROM Schedules
	WHERE itemId = ? AND eventId != ? AND startDate > ?
	ORDER BY startDate"""
	tasks = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryTasks, [itemId, eventId, originalStartDate])
	for task in tasks:
		if task['startDate'] < currentEnd:
			duration = system.date.minutesBetween(task['startDate'], task['endDate'])
			newStart = currentEnd
			newEnd = system.date.addMinutes(newStart, duration)
			breakStart = system.date.setTime(newStart, breakStartHour, 0, 0)
			breakEndd = system.date.addDays(breakStart, 1)
			breakEnd = system.date.setTime(breakEndd, breakEndHour, 0, 0)
			if newEnd > breakStart:
				proposedEndDate1 = newEnd
				firstPartEnd1 = breakStart
				remainingDuration1 = system.date.minutesBetween(breakStart, proposedEndDate1)
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?", [newStart, firstPartEnd1, task['eventId']])
				system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?", [newStart, firstPartEnd1, task['eventId']])
				nextDayStart = system.date.addDays(newStart, 1)
				nextDayStartt = system.date.setTime(nextDayStart, breakEndHour+1, 0, 0)
				secondPartEnd1 = system.date.addMinutes(nextDayStartt, remainingDuration1)
				queryTasksxxx = "SELECT Department,Status,l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark FROM Request WHERE RID = ?"
				tasksrow1 = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryTasksxxx, [task['eventId']])
				tasksxxx = tasksrow1[0]
				insertQuery12 = "INSERT INTO Request (Department,SDateTime, EDateTime, Status, l,RequestTime,ProjectDescription,ProjectOwner,Remark) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?,?,?)"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(insertQuery12, [tasksxxx['Department'], nextDayStartt, secondPartEnd1, tasksxxx['Status'],tasksxxx['l'],tasksxxx['RequestTime'],tasksxxx['ProjectDescription'],tasksxxx['ProjectOwner'],tasksxxx['Remark']])
				maxx = "SELECT EDateTime FROM Request WHERE RID = (SELECT MAX(RID) FROM Request)"
				maxxrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(maxx)
				maxxans = maxxrow.getValueAt(0,"EDateTime")
				m = "SELECT DATEPART(MINUTE, ?) AS m"
				mm = system.db.runPrepQuery(m,[maxxans])
				mmm = mm[0]['m']
				namedQuery = "INSERT INTO Schedules SELECT E.ID AS itemId, R.RID AS eventId, R.SDateTime AS startDate, R.EDateTime AS endDate, R.ProjectDescription AS label, R.l AS leadTime FROM Department AS E join Request AS R ON E.Department=R.Department WHERE R.RID NOT IN (SELECT eventId FROM Schedules) AND not (R.Status = 'Slot Not Available')"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(namedQuery)
				minn = "SELECT eventId, startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
				minnrow = system.db.runPrepQuery(minn)
				st = minnrow[0]['startDate']
				en = minnrow[0]['endDate']
				ei = minnrow[0]['eventId']
				if mmm == 30:
					addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -30)
					addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -30)
				else:
					addddstart = system.date.addMinutes(st, -60)
					addddend = system.date.addMinutes(en, -60)
				now = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = (SELECT MAX(eventId) FROM Schedules)"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(now,[addddstart,addddend])
#				namedQuery1 = "INSERT INTO Schedules SELECT E.ID AS itemId, R.RID AS eventId, R.SDateTime AS startDate, R.EDateTime AS endDate, R.ProjectDescription AS label, R.l AS leadTime FROM Department AS E join Request AS R ON E.Department=R.Department WHERE R.RID NOT IN (SELECT eventId FROM Schedules) AND not (R.Status = 'Slot Not Available')"
#				system.db.runPrepUpdate(namedQuery1)
				currentEnd = addddend
				queryTasks = """SELECT itemId, eventId, startDate, endDate, label
				FROM Schedules
				WHERE itemId = ? AND eventId NOT IN (?,?) AND startDate >= ?
				ORDER BY startDate"""
				tasks = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryTasks, [itemId, eventId, ei, addddstart])
			else:
				updateTask = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateTask, [newStart, newEnd, task['eventId']])
				updateRequest = "UPDATE Request SET SDateTime = ?, EDateTime = ? WHERE RID = ?"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateRequest, [newStart, newEnd, task['eventId']])
				currentEnd = newEnd
		else:
			pass

# Get swap parameter
	swap = self.session.custom.swap
	
	# Get selected task details
	eventId = self.props.selectedEvent.eventId  # This is an array of selected tasks
	if swap == 0:
		system.perspective.openPopup(
		id="yiKlMo63",
		view="Detailspopup",
		params={"eventId": eventId})

# Assume you have the IDs of the two tasks to swap
	task1_id = self.props.selectedEvent.eventId
	task2_id = self.props.selectedEvent.eventId
	
	# Step 1: Fetch startDate and endDate of both tasks
	query = "SELECT eventId, startDate, endDate FROM Schedules WHERE eventId IN (?, ?)"
	tasks = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [task1_id, task2_id])
	
	if len(tasks) != 2:
	    system.perspective.print("Error: One or both tasks not found.")
	else:
	    # Extract task data
	    task1 = tasks[0] if tasks[0]['eventId'] == task1_id else tasks[1]
	    task2 = tasks[1] if tasks[0]['eventId'] == task1_id else tasks[0]
	
	    # Calculate durations
	    duration1 = system.date.getTime(task1['endDate']) - system.date.getTime(task1['startDate'])
	    duration2 = system.date.getTime(task2['endDate']) - system.date.getTime(task2['startDate'])
	
	    # Swap startDates
	    newStart1 = task2['startDate']
	    newStart2 = task1['startDate']
	
	    # Calculate new endDates
	    newEnd1 = system.date.addMillis(newStart1, duration1)
	    newEnd2 = system.date.addMillis(newStart2, duration2)
	
	    # Step 2: Update both tasks in the database
	    updateQuery = "UPDATE Schedules SET startDate = ?, endDate = ? WHERE eventId = ?"
	    system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateQuery, [newStart1, newEnd1, task1_id])
	    system.db.runPrepUpdate(updateQuery, [newStart2, newEnd2, task2_id])

transforms.code:
from java.util import Calendar
	cal = Calendar.getInstance()
	cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY,6)
	cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE,0)
	cal.set(Calendar.SECOND,0)
	cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND,0)
	return cal.getTime()

from java.util import Calendar
	from java.util import ArrayList, HashMap
	
	# Configuration
	numDays = 22  # Number of future days to repeat
	
	# Fetch item IDs dynamically from database
	query = "SELECT ID FROM Department"
	items = [row['ID'] for row in system.db.runQuery(query)]
	
	# Result list
	events = ArrayList()
	
	for itemId in items:
	    # Add today's early morning downtime (from yesterday 18:30 to today 07:30)
	    startCal = Calendar.getInstance()
	    startCal.add(Calendar.DATE, -1)
	    startCal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 20)
	    startCal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
	    startCal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
	    startCal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
	    start = startCal.getTime()
	
	    endCal = Calendar.getInstance()
	    endCal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 8)
	    endCal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
	    endCal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
	    endCal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
	    end = endCal.getTime()
	
	    event = HashMap()
	    event["itemId"] = itemId
	    event["startDate"] = start
	    event["endDate"] = end
	    events.add(event)
	
	    # Add future 7 days of downtime
	    for i in range(numDays):
	        startCal = Calendar.getInstance()
	        startCal.add(Calendar.DATE, i)
	        startCal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 20)
	        startCal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
	        startCal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
	        startCal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
	        start = startCal.getTime()
	
	        endCal = Calendar.getInstance()
	        endCal.add(Calendar.DATE, i + 1)
	        endCal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 8)
	        endCal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0)
	        endCal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
	        endCal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
	        end = endCal.getTime()
	
	        event = HashMap()
	        event["itemId"] = itemId
	        event["startDate"] = start
	        event["endDate"] = end
	        events.add(event)
	
	return events
